name: joly-fish
description: A collection of Surplus components for CCNQ4

scripts.build: coffee -c util/*.coffee.md && coffee -c -o jsx src/*.coffee.md && mkdir -p component/ && (cd jsx/ && for f in *.js; do coffee -e 'compiler = require("surplus/compiler"); process.stdin.setEncoding("utf-8"); require("stream-to-string")(process.stdin).then (t) -> console.log compiler.compile t' < $f > ../component/$f; done)
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm install --only=dev && rm package-lock.json && npm run build
scripts.pretest: npm install && rm package-lock.json && npm run build

author: St√©phane Alnet <stephane@shimaore.net> (https://stephane.shimaore.net/)
